name: Dungeon Dwellers: Frostbitten
description:
A retro RPG bullet hell with an open world and LoZ style map and puzzles.

WASD to move, Mouse to shoot and aim. Z to change cross hair type.

NOTE: this game is in extremely early beta. (possibly even pre-beta)
it's basically just a tech demo right now. But once all the main mechanics are put in place, i will begin developing the story and map.
Please give feed back on the mechanics and art style, but please be aware that nothing in this game is set in stone.

I am looking to have a community heavily involved in the content creation of this game. Enemies, bosses, puzzle, weapons, etc.
I feel that to allow people to create my game alongside me like this will allow people to do what I always wished developers would do. So please submit ideas. (Ideas may not be added. Claiming a Reward-Title guarantees I will use at least 1 idea from you.
